Articles.Content:
Greetings to all:

Just purchased the game last night and I can already tell this is going to be a great experience. I've been a gamer and a "geek" for a very long time and I usually judge a game initially by it's ability to "deaden the sense of time" in the game during the first few days. I started playing the career mode last night at 8:00PM and realized after a while I hadn't heard my wife making noises in the living room which she usually does at night...I stepped away from the computer to find out if she was ok. It was 12:45AM. I had no idea of how late it was. This is a sign of a very good game!

Although, I feel I'm doomed now. KSP invaded my dreams last night and I "had" to login this morning to test something that I dreamed about. (It worked too, lol)...

I'm happily [exhausted] for the foreseeable future!

Anyways, wanted to sign into the forums and say hello!

Walzak

[Mod Edit: Language Please!]
Welcome to the forums. May your stay be pleasant and full of explosions.

Haha. Welcome Walzak. Don't forget to tend to the family once in a while.

Hope you enjoy your stay!
